pages.text: When you open your inventory, you will see a grid of blocks and items on the right side of your screen. This is JEI.$(br2)JEI allows you to search for specific items/blocks by name, mod, and description.

pages.title: Quick Tips
pages.text: $(li)$(l)Show Recipes$(): Click Item $(o)in JEI$() or hover over item and press $(l)$(k:jei.showRecipe)$()$(li)$(l)Show Uses$(): Right-click Item $(o)in JEI$() or hover over item and press $(l)$(k:jei.showUses)$()$(li)$(l)Search:$() @<modname> limits results to that mod.
$(l)Left clicking$() any item in JEI will show you how to obtain that item.$(br2)$(l)Right clicking$() an item in JEI will show you what recipes that item is used in.

pages.title: Further Explanation
pages.text: Along the top are tabs of different recipes.$(br2)The first tab will always be the crafting recipe, if it is an item that can be crafted.$(br2)Other tabs can include smelting, stone cutting, create fan recipes, uncrafting, and more!
